roleset.name: raise a child
roleset.note: REAR-V NOTES: Frames file for 'rear' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, comparison with 'raise'. (from rear.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passivized
example.text: While [Mr. Roderick]-1 was reared *trace*-1 in the shadows of Pittsburgh's smoking mills, Mr. Corry grew up in Cincinnati, a city nicknamed ``Porkapolis'' and more accustomed to pork chops than pig iron.
example.arg: in the shadows of Pittsburgh's smoking mills

example.name: with parent
example.text: John reared a litter of puppies.

roleset.name: jump (like an animal)
roleset.note: REAR-V NOTES: Frame created by Jena. (from rear.02-v)

example.text: Who *T* dares *PRO* wields his sword and makes his horse rear?
